resources.string:
1. Signing In
For the first use of this app, you must sign in using your e-mail and password. After you sign in, you cannot sign out, so be careful. One phone is registered for one user.

2. Checking In/Out
After signing in, you can start checking in/out by clicking the "Check In/Check Out" toggle button. Only registered user who is in the range of the their respective office(s) can check-in/out. To check in/out, you must enable wi-fi/mobile connection.

3. Showing Performance
You can see your daily worktime. Simply go to "Show Performance" page by clicking "Show Performance" button in Check-in/out page. In "Show Performance" page, you can see your worktime daily by selecting "from" date and "to" date and then click "Show" button.

4. Setting Notification
You can also add notification to remind you to check in and/or out. Simply go to "Set Notification" page by clicking "Set Notification" button in Check-in/out page. You can choose which notification to activate and on what time it should notify you.

5. Modifying Notification Settings
In "Set Notification" page click the option menu button then click "Settings" to modify notification settings. You can choose to change time formatting and/or notification ringtone.
